author: Anam. 🐾
text: Only when you need someone the most, that person is not around.

author: Anam. 🐾
text: Idk if you are reading this or not but know that I know you lied and you are such a big liar. Damn you. Well, actually, fuck you! Shits on me for trusting you. Kutty! 🙄👊🏼

author: Anam. 🐾
text: It was beautiful but not meant to be. https://t.co/MVc8RzQJv0

author: Anam. 🐾
text: THE APOLOGY HAS TO BE AS LOUD AS THE PAIN YOU GIVE TO SOMEONE. https://t.co/bMghDqh9W3

author: Anam. 🐾

author: Anam. 🐾
text: How can people move ahead in life leaving someone broken?

author: Anam. 🐾
text: Hate you for the fact that you ignited something inside of me and then soon after left it wandering alone. What was I supposed to do? I needed a shoulder, someone to hold on to and made some rash and irrational decisions that I can't even back up from. It all started with you.

author: Anam. 🐾
text: O Allah, please don't break a loving heart through me. That be the last thing I'd ever want to happen.
